The Art of the Brick Miami: A LEGOÂ® Art Exhibit Menu TICKETS TICKETS About Reviews Practical info Location Gallery FAQs Groups Cities TICKETS TICKETS About Reviews Practical info Location Gallery FAQs Groups Cities The experience is closed! The experience is closed! - Miami - Located at Olympia Theater! Located at Olympia Theater! Rated 4.7/5 on Google BOOK NOW BOOK NOW Family-friendly Great variety of sculptures Play Area The Art of the Brick Miami The Exhibit One of CNN's Must See Exhibitions After touring over 100 cities in 24 countries and entering CNN's list of âMust-Seeâ exhibitions, Art of the Brick is coming to Miami. The exhibit immerses the visitor in a cheerful and colorful world. The artist used more than a million bricks, creating over 150+ works of art that can make adults and children smile and reflect. The World's Best Known Exhibit of LEGO Â® Art The collection includes many sculptures alongside re-imagined versions of some of the worldâs most famous art masterpieces, such as Michelangeloâs David, Van Goghâs Starry Night and Da Vinciâs Mona Lisa. Among the wonders, visitors will also find a 6-metre-long reproduction of a Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton and an innovative, multimedia collection of LEGO photography produced alongside award-winning photographer Dean West. Donât miss this exciting exhibition seen by over 10 million people worldwide! Embrace your creativity! Get inspired at the Expo and explore our play and build area to create your own LEGO sculptures! You'll also find a gift shop with exclusive LEGO items so you can get creative at home. Art of the Brick Reviews What people around the world think of our exhibit Samantha S. âGreat exhibition! Very artistic. I went with 4 kids, aged 18, 10, 9 and 5. We all loved it.â Patrick R. âGreat exhibition with impressive work for all ages.â Jessica P. âA really nice experience. It was inspiring and emotional. A must-see!â Jean-FranÃ§ois Marchant âWow. Really worth seeing this exhibition. We came as a family (aged 13, 17, 47 and 55) and we all loved it â even those of us who donât play with lego. Itâs definitely an exhibition for art lovers <3.â Muriel Beckhaus âPerfect! A very original exhibit with superb creations. Congrats to Nathan Sawaya.â ChloÃ© Theunis âWe had a wonderful time as a family. Thanks so much.â Press reviews NBC Miami "If you were a kid who grew up playing with LEGOs, prepare to be amazed." FOX LEGO on Another Level! WSVN / FOX Miami "This curated collection is beautiful and playful." Information Date: From January 27th 2024 Opening hours: Opens every day at 10 a.m. Closes at 5h30 on Mondays and Wednesdays, 7p.m. on Fridays and Saturdays and 5 p.m. on Sundays Closed on Tuesdays and Thursdays Duration: The visit will take around 60 minutes Location: Olympia Theater, 174 E Flagler St Price: Adults starting at $22.90 and kids at $15.90. Children under 4 enter for FREE! Age Requirements: All ages! Parking Info: You can find  parking options here Accessibility: Fully accessible BOOK NOW BOOK NOW Are you looking for the perfect gift? Get an Art of the Brick Gift Card! There is no better gift for your loved ones than sharing an experience like this. Share a journey full of memories that invites everyone to step into this LEGOÂ® world! BUY NOW Art of the Brick Miami Location Olympia Theater, 174 E Flagler St, Miami, FL, United States.
                                      33131 The Olympia Theater: Downtown Miami's Historic Performing Arts Center â Since 1926. A historic and iconic venue with a stunning Mediterranean design, it has hosted notable performers since 1926. In 1984, it received historical designation by the NRHP. Get directions Gallery artofthebrickexpo Share your #ArtoftheBrickExpo moments and tag our account for repost! Follow us on Instagram FAQs Maybe you can find the answer here! Show FAQS THE EXPERIENCE What can I expect from Art of the Brick Experience? The Art of the Brick is the worldâs most popular display of LEGOÂ® art with over one million LEGO bricks transformed into more than 150 sculptures by artist Nathan Sawaya. Featuring intriguing works of art made exclusively from one of the most recognizable toys in the world, The Art of the Brick will inspire visitors of all ages. This critically acclaimed collection includes Sawaya's original sculptures as well as re-imagined versions of some of the worldâs most famous art masterpieces, such as Michelangeloâs David, Van Goghâs Starry Night and Da Vinciâs Mona Lisa. Other highlights include a 20-foot Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton and an innovative, multimedia collection of LEGO brick-infused photography produced in tandem with award-winning photographer Dean West. Where is the experience located? The event will take place at Olympia Theater- 174 E Flagler St, Miami, FL 33131. Get directions Does the experience take place in an indoor or outdoor venue? The experience will be held in an indoor venue. Will there be air conditioning? Yes, the building is fully climate-controlled. Is it COVID secure and safe? Local regulations for COVID safety will apply. Is the experience accessible for deaf people? Yes, the experience is primarily visual with informative signage throughout the venue. Will there be strobe lights? No. Will food be available on-site for purchase? No, but there are third-party food vendors in close proximity to the experience. Can I take photos or record the experience? Feel free to take photos and share them. When taking photos, please make sure not to disturb other customers. Professional equipment and tripods are not permitted. How long does the experience last? The experience takes approximately 60 minutes but you are welcome to stay as long as you want. Will I be able to pay in cash? The online tickets can only be paid for by card. Onsite tickets and merch items can be paid in cash or by card. From which age onwards do I not need to be accompanied by an adult? From the age of 12 onwards. Is the show suitable for pregnant people? The experience requires the audience to be on their feet, moving around the venue for approximately 60 minutes, however, the experience does not feature tension or highly physical movements. We suggest you speak to the manager on arrival to discuss any specific requirements so that they can assist. Is there a place where I can leave my belongings? No, there is no place to leave belongings. TICKETS Can I purchase a ticket at the event venue? It is recommended that you buy tickets in advance, tickets onsite will be dependent on capacity and availability. Where can I get tickets? On the Fever App, available on Google Play and the Apple Store. , or on the Fever website. Are refunds allowed? What is the exchange policy? Subject to availability, changes of date and/or time are permitted up to 48 hours before the start time of your experience. In such a case, please contact us indicating your ticket ID. Refunds are not allowed under any circumstances. For more information, you can refer to our T&Cs. Is there a Military discount? No. Do children under 4 have to pay for a ticket? Children under 4 years old enter for free and you donât need to buy a ticket. Do you offer a group discount? For groups under 40 people, you can buy your tickets directly through the main page (select the âGroup Bundleâ option when choosing your ticket type). For special requests or groups over 40, please fill out the group form . Is there a suggested dress code for this experience? Since the experience typically lasts around one hour we recommend comfortable shoes, there is however no dress code - whatever makes you feel comfortable to ensure that you can fully enjoy the experience! ACCESS Do I need to wear a mask? Masks are not required at the event as per current COVID guidelines (subject to change if the government guidelines change). Do I need to arrive at the start of my scheduled session? It is recommended that you arrive within the time stated on your ticket, but you can arrive within the next 30 minutes. What happens if I arrive late? Your ticket will still be valid, but you may be required to wait until there is space in the following time slots. Can I bring animals? No, this event is not pet-friendly, only service animals are allowed. Is there an age requirement? All ages are welcome! Children under the age of 4 can visit free of charge and minors under the age of 12 need to be accompanied by adults. Is it appropriate for young kids? The Art of the Brick is a wonderful experience for all ages! Is the venue ADA-compliant? The exhibit is wheelchair accessible. Is there parking available? You can find parking options here How can I arrive? Please check the best way to arrive here: Get directions What are the prohibited items at the experience? Weapons, drugs, outside food & beverage. Is the venue easily accessible? The Van Gogh exhibition is accessible to wheelchairs. Please contact us and we will advise on how we can best assist you. Do you offer free tickets for carers? People with disabilities pay the reduced price, while the accompanying person is entitled to free admission. I canât find my ticket - what now? On the Fever app, in the Tickets section. If you haven't already, you can download the app from Google Play and Apple Store. On the Fever website. In the purchase confirmation email Fever sent you. If you still can not find your ticket, please write to us here . Do I need to print my ticket? No, printing is not needed. OTHERS Can I hire the venue for a private or company event? Yes, please fill out our request form here . Are there chairs available? Yes, there will be benches in the Experience. Are audio guides available? No. Produced by Media partner CONTACT PRESS PARTNERSHIP INFLUENCER GROUP BOOKINGS The Art Of The Brick Â© 2025 FEVER. Privacy Policy

Hardscape Specialists, Miami, FL Your Hardscape Specialists Home About Project Gallery Services Driveways Poolscapes Repairs and Maintenance Walkways Outdoor Living Contact Quality Construction and Design for All Hardscape Projects Miami Brick Contractors, Inc. has a sterling reputation that was built on providing first-rate hardscaping services. We can handle a wide range of tasks, from repairing, cleaning, and sealing existing pavers to installing new ones. Our team of hardscape specialists will add new and exciting elements to your property using a variety of beautiful bricks, natural stones, and other materials. Let us help you transform your home and increase its value exponentially. What We Do We serve residential and commercial clients alike. Our hardscape specialists can beautify your driveway, patio, poolside area, walkways, walls, and other outdoor spaces with pavers made of clay bricks, concrete, or natural stone. If you want your backyard to become even more inviting and elegant, we are the contractor for you. Contact Us We are proud to say that we have a long list of satisfied clients in the Florida counties of Miami-Dade and Broward. If you are interested in working with us, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Who We Are – The Brick Skip to content About Us Who We Are What We Do Our Vision Chaplaincy Join Us Our Work Brick Homes Brick Engage Brick Food Brick Re-Use Brick Skills Brick Multibank Brick Resources Our Impact Stories Support Us Donate Text Brick £1 – Because No One Should Have to Choose Between Eating and Heating Join Team Brick For The Wigan 10K Fundraising Monthly Giving Become a Corporate Partner Multibanks – The Distribution Revolution Volunteer Furniture Donations Our Business Supporters News About Us Who We Are What We Do Our Vision Chaplaincy Join Us Our Work Brick Homes Brick Engage Brick Food Brick Re-Use Brick Skills Brick Multibank Brick Resources Our Impact Stories Support Us Donate Text Brick £1 – Because No One Should Have to Choose Between Eating and Heating Join Team Brick For The Wigan 10K Fundraising Monthly Giving Become a Corporate Partner Multibanks – The Distribution Revolution Volunteer Furniture Donations Our Business Supporters News About Us Who We Are What We Do Our Vision Chaplaincy Join Us Our Work Brick Homes Brick Engage Brick Food Brick Re-Use Brick Skills Brick Multibank Brick Resources Our Impact Stories Support Us Donate Text Brick £1 – Because No One Should Have to Choose Between Eating and Heating Join Team Brick For The Wigan 10K Fundraising Monthly Giving Become a Corporate Partner Multibanks – The Distribution Revolution Volunteer Furniture Donations Our Business Supporters News DONATE TODAY GET IN TOUCH Search DONATE TODAY GET IN TOUCH Who We Are WE ARE QUEEN'S HALL ACTION ON POVERTY: THE BRICK. Social Justice is at the heart of what we do. Our most important resource is our STAFF and VOLUNTEERS. We couldn’t do our vital work without them. Staff and volunteer engagement is at the forefront of everything we do and we are a Real Living Wage accredited employer, proud supporters of the Greater Manchester Good Employment Charter, and the recipient of the Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service. The Brick delivers effective solutions to address poverty and homelessness across the Wigan and Leigh Borough, providing supported and emergency accommodation services, street outreach services, wrap around person-led support, a food community and affordable furniture and essential household items to make a house a home.
